plot: Todd Hanson usually has no problem fitting in; good looking, athletic, funny... But when you are the only straight guy in an all gay high school, fitting in is never easy.
title: One Child Left Behind: The Todd Hanson Story
plot_es: Todd Hanson usually has no problem fitting in; good looking, athletic, funny... But when you are the only straight guy in an all gay high school, fitting in is never easy.
original_name: One Child Left Behind: The Todd Hanson Story
